scripts.clean: find packages -name '.vite' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find packages -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:all: cd packages/core && bun test:all && cd ../viewer && bun test:e2e
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/parser && bun run typecheck && cd ../markdown-renderer && bun run typecheck && cd ../dom-renderer && bun run typecheck && cd ../core && bun run typecheck && cd ../viewer && bun run typecheck && cd ../key && bun run typecheck && cd ../pages && bun run typecheck && cd ../pptx && bun run typecheck && cd ../ooxml-types && bun run typecheck && cd ../ooxml-parser && bun run typecheck && cd ../document-types && bun run typecheck && cd ../docx && bun run typecheck && cd ../docx-inspector && bun run typecheck && cd ../shared-utils && bun run typecheck
scripts.test:e2e:headless: cd packages/viewer && bun run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright.precommit.config.ts
scripts.precommit: node scripts/check-file-sizes.cjs && bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test:coverage

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test:coverage
